synopsis: While Mahoro and Suguru are shopping, they come encounter an android that is being chased by mecha robots out to kill her.

title.jp: From Today On, You Are Minawa

synopsis: Minawa is now attending school with Suguru and they are pretending that she is Mahoro's sister, but she makes many blunders and sustains many injuries.

Mahoro buys some strange machines so that she can use them to enhance her bust. This does not work so the next day she receives a strange package from Vesper that contains missiles that she can contain in her bra.
Vesper tells Mahoro that a bomb is hidden underneath the school. The students try to take the bomb as they believe it is a magic love granting item.

title.jp: Will I Catch a Cold Tomorrow?

synopsis: Mahoro and Minawa decorate the house for a Christmas party that Suguru is going to throw.
Now that is is New Years the group goes to the shrine for good luck.
Suguru wants to participate in the annual fighting festival but Mahoro is against this idea. Suguru sneaks out of the house to go participate so Mahoro and Minawa go out to find him.
Suguru's Grandfather comes for a visit as he has been worried about his Grandson. He sees that he is being well taken care of.

title.jp: Sweeter Than Love, But a Bit Bitter

synopsis: It is now Valentines Day and everyone is busy making their valentines and passing out chocolate candy. Mahoro teachs Minawa how to make the chocolate candy and tells her she has to give it to someone special.
An evil android shows up and tells Minawa that she is to take Suguru hostage. Mahoro finds out from Slash what has happened and she goes to the lab to find Suguru.

title.jp: A Wish, the Color of Cherry Blossoms

synopsis: After everyone has been rescued they are taken to Vesper where they tell Suguru everything. Mahoro begins to realize how attached she is to Suguru and her life with him and their friends that she can not bear the thought of leaving them.
Mahoro has to fight for her life and for the first time she is afraid of the future and even of death.

Slash still seems to hate Ryuuga. He follows him all day, while Ryuuga gets his school teacher job back. Just as Ryuuga is about to teleport back up to his station, Slash confronts him, and they begin fighting. Mahoro busts in and stops them. She lectures them a bit, and then runs off chasing Suguru. The next day, Mahoro is going shopping, and Suguru is supposed to help her, but they end up meeting this small girl, who is being chased by mecha robots out to kill her. She is an android, and they seem to want her dead. So Mahoro protects her.

title.jp: From Today On, You Are Minawa

synopsis: Since Minawa (#370) is staying with Suguru and Mahoro, they use the pretense that she is Mahoro's younger sister, and that her name is Minawa. She has to attend school with Suguru, since she is supposed to be 14. However at school, she keeps messing up, and getting injured. Meanwhile, at school, Ryuuga and Slash know that she is from the Caretakers organization, so they too keep an eye on her for suspicious activity, since the Caretakers organization is not to be trusted.
